mapper.select: select occupation_table.occupation_id from user_table, occupation_table,recommended_table,recommended_occupation where user_table.occupation_id = occupation_table.occupation_id and user_table.user_id=#{userId} and recommended_table.recommended_id = recommended_occupation.recommended_id and recommended_occupation.occupation_id = occupation_table.occupation_id
select number_of_desktops from user_table where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update user_table set number_of_desktops = number_of_desktops + 1 where user_id = #{userId}
update user_table set number_of_desktops = number_of_desktops - 1 where user_id = #{userId}
